readme:
# ion-action-sheet-controller

Action Sheet controllers programmatically control the action sheet component. Action Sheets can be created and dismissed from the action sheet controller. View the [Action Sheet](../action-sheet) documentation for a full list of options to pass upon creation.
docs: Action Sheet controllers programmatically control the action sheet component. Action Sheets can be created and dismissed from the action sheet controller. View the [Action Sheet](../action-sheet) documentation for a full list of options to pass upon creation.

methods.name: create
methods.docs: Create an action sheet overlay with action sheet options.

methods.name: dismiss
methods.signature: dismiss(data?: any, role?: string | undefined, id?: string | undefined) => Promise<boolean>
methods.docs: Dismiss the open action sheet overlay.

methods.name: getTop
methods.docs: Get the most recently opened action sheet overlay.
